```coq
intros st h i out st' m.
destruct i.
- apply doLeader_key_in_output_list.
  eapply handleInput_doLeader. eauto.
- eapply raft_net_invariant_handle_input with (P := fun _ => ~ key_in_output_list client id out).
  + apply raft_net_invariant_client_request.
  + eauto.
  + eauto.
  + eauto.
  + intros. eapply key_in_output_list_empty. eauto.
Qed.
